text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Shall we take a break soon?
I'll set a timer.
Yes!

While there are still some details to iron out,
it's coming together nicely.
Yes...

I'm looking forward... to sharing the stage...
with everyone...
I understand!

I want to make it a fun concert for both the fans and
everyone at 283PRO!
Indeed.

Everyone!
Can I have a moment of your time?
If it's okay with you, may I take some photos?

Since all of 283 is gathered for this special concert,
I thought it would be nice to hype it up!

I thought I'd use it for promoting the concert and
giving a glimpse into Houkura's daily life on Twesta later!

Hehe,
it's for promoting our joint concert, right?

Yes! That's it!
I'll confirm with Producer about it!

I agree!
What kind of photos should we take?

Perhaps the usual practice scenes...
or should there be something more special?

That's true.
This isn't just any ordinary concert.

Yes...
A joint concert...
It's a super-duper amazing concert, even more than usual!

We want to convey the elements of being more
powerful and lively than usual, right...?!
...Shall we strike a cool pose with just the five of us...?
Like, "Bam!" kind of feeling...?
Bam! kind of feeling...?
Like the entrance of heroes, right!?
Exactly!
It would indeed make for a glamorous photo.

Inviting members... of other units...
might be...

Oh, that sounds good too!
It's unique to a joint event, after all.

Maybe filming a video would be a good idea.
It would convey the energy better.

Oh, then shall we go get some enthusiastic comments!?
Let's make it a Houkura interview...

The break...
is over...
First, we need to resume practice.

Yes.
Let's discuss this matter later.

Yeah! It would be troublesome if it turned into
"Houkura are just fooling around and not practicing"...
Hahaha / Hahaha / Hahaha / Hehehe / Hehehe
